borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a front and rear roof extension, involving an increase in the ridge height by 200mm; erection of a single storey rear extension to the side and rear of the existing back addition; excavation of the front and rear garden to form lightwells, in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement and excavation underneath part of the rear garden in connection with the creation of a gym room; erection of an extension at roof level to house an internal staircase and erection of opaque glazed screen around the flat roof at third floor in connection with the creation of a roof terrace; installation of solar panels at main roof level and 2no solar panels above the roof of the second floor rear back addition; erection of an external staircase from basement to garden level at the rear of the property; installation of 2 windows to the side elevation at second floor level; bricking up of 2 windows in the side elevation at first floor level; alterations to the front gable to restore its original form; installation of 2no air source heat pumps at main roof level and alterations to the extension at roof level to house an internal staircase.
